channel.title: [PI] Making A Command [PI] HELP
channel.description: i wana make a command so when i type updatelog it makes everybody say "Please log out we are updating re log in 2 minutes" also could you tell me how to make the server do random saving :) and where to put these.

item.title: [PI] Making A Command [PI] HELP
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("updatelog") && c.playerRights > 0) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("Please Logout while we are updating! Log back in 2 minutes.); } } }

Read full topic
